meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Gerry Cook Chloe Ross Richard Perez-Pena Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #712.

td.p: Gerry Cook, a probation officer originally from Queens, New York
Chloe Ross, a food and restaurant writer from Los Angeles, California
Richard Perez-Pena, a journalist originally from Cuba (whose 4-day cash winnings total $30,800)

tr.td: LITERATURE
ACTORS & ROLES
ONE SONG
(Alex: All of the clues will pertain to one particular piece of music & that will be the first clue at the top.)
THE BLUE & THE GRAY
SEWING
STUPID GEOGRAPHY

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In "Of Mice & Men", George was going to let him take care of the rabbits')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: In "Of Mice & Men", George was going to let him take care of the rabbits

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', 'Christopher Reeve said of this role, "It takes me 3 running steps to take off; I used to be able to do it in 1"')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_3_5', 'clue_DJ_3_5_stuck', '[Richard had a smirk and his tongue in his cheek as he pondered his wager.]
(Richard: I\'ll bet 300, please.)
(Alex: You can see the wheels turning can\'t you ladies and gentlemen? If he\'s wrong he will have exactly twice Chloë\'s total.)
(Richard: What is 13?)

23

Richard
')

tr.td: Richard
Chloë
Gerry
(lock-tie game)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '
GerryWho is Alexander Hamilton?
$1,000
ChloëWho is Aaron Burr?
$3,900
RichardWho was Alexander Hamilton
$1,700
Alexander Hamilton')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'This man was killed in a duel in Weehawken, New Jersey 2 1/2 years after his son died in a duel there')

tr.td: HISTORIC NAMES
This man was killed in a duel in Weehawken, New Jersey 2 1/2 years after his son died in a duel there
Richard
Chloë
Gerry
5-day champion: $40,300 + Jeopardy! box game or computerized version
3rd place: Ricoh KR-30SP camera + Jeopardy! box game or computerized version
2nd place: trip on Eastern to Caribbean & stay at Xanadu Beach & Marina Resort + Jeopardy! box game or computerized version
Richard
Chloë
Gerry

22 R
(including 1 DD),
4 W
(including 1 DD)
